reviews.review_msg:
Include attendance in additional courses beyond the syllabus as part of the overall grade
usless and old youtube veido

Attending this class 3 times/week very nearly drove me to insanity. Possibly the most incomprehensible professor ever had @ SFU. Notes were absolutely terrible, lectures had no direction...jumped from one topic to the next...I was literally swearing out loud in frustration. Having said that, he's one of the nicest/most dedicated profs on campus.
